titleStmt.title: The fleire· As it hath beene often played in the Blacke-Fryers by the Children of the Reuells. Written by Edward Sharpham of the Middle Temple, Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Sharpham, Edward, 1576-1608.
Marston, John, 1575?-1634. Parasitaster.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] and are to be solde by F. B[urton] in Paules-Church-yard, at the signe of the Flower de Luce and the Crowne,

notesStmt.note: Printer's and bookseller's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Paules-Church-yard, at the signe of the Flower de Luce
